page.syntax: C browse.dialog(C layoutname [,C windowname [,C filter [,C order [,C queryFlags [,C position_x [,C position_y ]]]]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of an existing browse.

argument.name: windowname
argument.description: Optional. The title of the browse.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: position_x
argument.description: Optional. Default = "center". The horizontal position of the window. Possible values are:

argument.name: position_y
argument.description: Optional. Default = "center". The vertical position of the window. Possible values are:

page.description: Load and show a Browse as a dialog.
page.discussion: The BROWSE.DIALOG() method displays an existing browse. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
